songs.title: Joy to the World (Live at the Cathedral of St. John The Divine)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Joy to the world
The Lord is come
Let Earth receive her King
Let every heart prepare Him room
And heaven and nature sing
And heaven and nature sing (Oh)
And heaven, and heaven and nature sing (Oh yeah)
Joy to the world (Put your hands together down here)
The Lord is come
Let Earth receive her King, yeah
Let every heart prepare Him room
And heaven and nature sing
And heaven and nature sing
And heaven, and heaven and nature sing

[Verse 1]
Joy to the earth
The Savior reigns
Let men (Let men) their songs (Their songs) employ (Employ)
While fields and floods (Mm, oh yeah)
Rocks, hills and plains
Repeat (Repeat) the sounding joy
Repeat the sounding joy (Oh)
Repeat, repeat the sounding joy

[Chorus]
Joy to the world
All the boys and girls
Joy to the people everywhere you see
Joy to you and me
Joy to the world
All the boys and girls
Joy to the people everywhere you see
Joy to you and me

[Verse 2]
He rules the world (Yeah)
With truth and grace (With truth and grace)
And makes (And makes) the nations prove (The nations prove)
The glories of His righteousness
And wonders (And wonders) of His love
And wonders (Wonders) of His love
And wonders, wonders of His

[Chorus]
Joy, joy to the world
All the boys and girls
Joy to the people everywhere you see (Joy, joy, joy)
Joy to you and me
Joy to the people everywhere you see
Joy to you and me
Woo

[Spoken]
Let me hear you sing it

[Outro]
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel it)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel it)
Feel that joy (Oh yeah)
Feel that joy
Feel that joy (I feel it)
Feel that joy (I feel it)
Feel that joy (I feel it)
Feel that joy (I feel it)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel it)
Feel that joy (Feel, feel, feel it)
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Ah)
Feel that joy (Feel that joy)
Feel that joy (Can you feel it?)
Feel that joy (Can you feel it?)
Feel that joy (Can you feel it?)
Feel it?
I feel the joy
Feel it, feel, feel it
I feel the joy (I feel it, feel it, feel it)
I feel the joy (Can you feel it? I can feel it)
I feel the joy
I feel that joy

[Spoken]
Woo
Thank you
